mapper.select: SELECT a.userId,a.roleId,a.userName,a.createTime,a.createIp,a.isUsed,a.sortNo , b.roleCode,b.roleName FROM sysinfouser a left join sysinforole b on a.roleId = b.roleId WHERE a.userName=#{userName} AND a.passWord=#{passWord}

SELECT COUNT(1) AS nums FROM sysinfouser a WHERE 1=1
AND (a.userName LIKE '%${keyWord}%' or a.userId LIKE '%${keyWord}%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sysinfouser ( userName , passWord, createTime, sex , birthday , idCard ,mobile ,phone , email ,addr ,createUserId ,createIp ,isDefPassWord ,isUsed,sortNo, roleId ) VALUES ( #{userName} , #{passWord} , #{createTime} , #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{idCard },#{mobile } , #{phone } ,#{email } ,#{addr } ,#{createUserId } ,#{createIp } ,#{isDefPassWord } ,#{isUsed} ,#{sortNo}, #{roleId} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM sysinfouser a WHERE a.userId = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sysinfouser a WHERE a.userName = #{userName}
mapper.update: UPDATE sysinfouser SET userName = #{userName} , sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday} , idCard = #{idCard}, mobile = #{mobile}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, addr = #{addr}, operateUserId = #{operateUserId}, opetateTime = #{opetateTime}, isUsed = #{isUsed}, sortNo = #{sortNo} WHERE userId = #{userId}

UPDATE sysinfouser SET userName = #{userName} , passWord = #{passWord} , isDefPassWord = #{isDefPassWord} , operateUserId = #{operateUserId}, roleId = #{roleId}, opetateTime = #{opetateTime} WHERE userId = #{userId}
